attributes.action: Stop the 3p per mile charge on ev cars
attributes.additional_details: Taxes and bills are all going up! Now you’re trying to charge for something that unavoidable. Some people travel for work etc and even to have a job!
attributes.background: Stop the 3p per mile charge on ev cars outlined in the 2025 budget!

rejection.details:
You may be interested in these petitions, which call for similar action:

"Do not introduce pay-per-mile road charging for UK drivers"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749667

"Stop the EV Pay-Per-Mile Tax"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/752431

"Stop mileage tax on electric & plug-in hybrid cars & reduce public charging VAT"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/752170
